name: Gryps Labyrinth
description:
=_= Gryps Labyrinth=_=

This game was made in Unity for a College project on Experiential Puzzle in Augmented Reality. Set in Greece during a time where gods lived on top of a mountain, you play as "Theseus". After stumbling into his lair and slaying the beast, you must now try to make your way out, but with one catch, the way is closed. I higher being than you has locked the only way out and the only we to open the door is to bypass his mystical puzzles in the 3 remaining rooms he has set up. Can you beat the beast? Can you finish your quest? But most importantly, can you escape?

Gryps Labyrinth was created by myself and 2 other amazing game developers.

Team:

Aaron Heraghty - Director, Lead Programmer

Darragh Smith - Gameplay designer, Programmer

Vulcan Chertaraev - Lead Artist
